trans-unit.source: Defines the settings of a print job.
trans-unit.target: 定义打印作业的设置。

trans-unit.source: A PrintTicket object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintTicket document*.
trans-unit.target: PrintTicket 对象是某种类型的调用的 XML 文档的轻松-到-工作的带有表示*PrintTicket 文档*。

trans-unit.source: The latter is a set of instructions telling a printer how to set its various features (such as duplexing, collating, and stapling).
trans-unit.target: 后者是一组指令告知如何设置其各种功能 （如分页和装订，双工技术） 的打印机。

trans-unit.source: For example, to instruct the printer to turn on its stapler and staple print jobs in the upper left corner, the document would have a `<JobStapleAllDocuments … >` element that specifies **StapleTopLeft**.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指示打印机以打开其装订和装订左上角的打印作业，该文档应具有`<JobStapleAllDocuments … >`指定的元素**StapleTopLeft**。

trans-unit.source: The element is, in turn, represented by the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A> property of the PrintTicket object.
trans-unit.target: 元素，反过来，由表示<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A>PrintTicket 对象属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A>

trans-unit.source: The PrintTicket document must conform to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: PrintTicket 文档必须符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: The PrintTicket class enables your application to configure the printer's features without having to engage in any direct writing of XML <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: PrintTicket 类使你的应用程序配置打印机的功能而无需进行的任何直接编写 XML<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: All of the most popular features of home and business file and photo printers are represented by properties of PrintTicket the class.
trans-unit.target: 家庭和企业的文件和照片打印机的最常用功能的所有由 PrintTicket 类的属性表示。

trans-unit.source: But the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices.
trans-unit.target: 但是[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义多，通常，不功能和它可以进行扩展以便处理 specialty 打印设备的功能。

trans-unit.source: So, although the PrintTicket and <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the PrintTicket or <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，尽管 PrintTicket 和<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示 PrintTicket 中的打印设备功能或<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>类。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD︰ 如何︰ 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** When the PrintTicket object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintTicket document (as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the PrintTicket class.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**了采用 PrintTicket 文档的构造函数创建时 PrintTicket 对象 (作为<xref:System.IO.Stream>) 参数，该整个文档存储在中的对象，包括 express 不由任何 PrintTicket 类的公共属性表示的不太常见功能的 XML 元素中的非公共字段</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 类内<xref:System.Printing>命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>类使用 XML 流 （即包含 PrintTicket 文档） 符合用 XML[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: The constructor does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数不流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。

trans-unit.source: Accordingly, you should reset it immediately after calling the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 相应地，你应该重置它调用的构造函数后立即。

trans-unit.source: The entire PrintTicket document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> class.
trans-unit.target: 整个 PrintTicket 文档存储在中的对象，包括 express 不由任何<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>类</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>的公共属性表示的不太常见功能的 XML 元素中的非公共字段

trans-unit.source: In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> class.
trans-unit.target: 的文档中，如果有的话，将不验证私有部分由构造函数中，但所有**打印架构**-定义的部分进行验证，包括未由任何<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>类</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>的公共属性的部分

trans-unit.source: Accordingly, the <xref:System.FormatException> could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid.
trans-unit.target: 相应地，<xref:System.FormatException>可能即使所有的公共属性对应的 XML 标记无效时引发。</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: When any of the properties of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> are written to, this non-public PrintTicket document is changed as well.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个的属性时<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>写入到，此非公共 PrintTicket 文档也会更改。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: It is this non-public PrintTicket document that is returned by the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它是返回的此非公共 PrintTicket 文档<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML stream that describes a print job and conforms to the Print Schema.
trans-unit.target: XML 流，用于描述打印作业并符合打印架构。

trans-unit.source: xmlStream is .
trans-unit.target: xmlStreamis .

trans-unit.source: xmlStream is not valid XML.
trans-unit.target: xmlStream不是有效的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是否打印机逐份打印其输出。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`关键字，不`JobCollateAllDocuments`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.CollationCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.CollationCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.CollationCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.Collation"></xref> value indicating whether the printer collates its output.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.Collation"> </xref>值，该值指示是否打印机逐份打印其输出。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.Collation"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.Collation"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置针对打印作业的副本数。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`关键字，或`PageCopies`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the printer's maximum by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.MaxCopyCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以对其进行测试对打印机的最大使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.MaxCopyCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.MaxCopyCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nullable <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies how many copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 null<xref:System.Int32>值，指定将打印的份数</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts on the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值打印机是否用基于设备的基于计算机的上打印作业的字体的字体替换。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution"></xref> value indicating whether the device substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts for the current print job.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution"> </xref>值，该值指示设备是否用基于设备的基于计算机的当前打印作业的字体的字体替换。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating what kind of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值哪种类型的双侧打印，如果有的话，打印机时使用的打印作业。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentDuplex`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DuplexingCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DuplexingCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DuplexingCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.Duplexing"></xref> value indicating what sort of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.Duplexing"> </xref>值，该值指示什么样的双侧打印，如果有的话，打印机时使用的打印作业。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.Duplexing"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.Duplexing"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> object that represents the property values of a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>表示的属性值的对象<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>作为符合 XML 流[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: If any properties of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何属性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>是`null`，它们将只需不包含在 XML 标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>对象使用包含标记元素不表示任何 PrintTicket 文档构造<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法返回 PrintTicket 文档。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>对象，描述与符合 XML 的打印票证[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值哪些输入的 bin （纸盒） 使用。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: That is, there will be no markup for the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s features `JobInputBin`, `DocumentInputBin`, or `PageInputBin`.
trans-unit.target: 即，将有没有标记[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`， `DocumentInputBin`，或`PageInputBin`。

trans-unit.source: When this property is not `null`, it will have the following relationships to the features defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 当此属性不是`null`，它将具有以下关系中定义的功能[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: - If the XML form of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> contains `JobInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `JobInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `DocumentInputBin` or `PageInputBin`.
trans-unit.target: -如果 XML 形式<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>包含`JobInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`JobInputBin`(无论是否还有`DocumentInputBin`或`PageInputBin`。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: markup in the XML version of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>).
trans-unit.target: 中的 XML 版本的标记<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>)。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: - If there is no `JobInputBin` markup, but there is `DocumentInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `DocumentInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `PageInputBin` markup) present.
trans-unit.target: -如果没有任何`JobInputBin`标记，但没有`DocumentInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`DocumentInputBin`(无论是否还有`PageInputBin`标记) 存在。

trans-unit.source: - If there is neither `JobInputBin` nor `DocumentInputBin` markup, but there is `PageInputBin` markup, then this property has the same value as `PageInputBin`.
trans-unit.target: -如果既无`JobInputBin`也不`DocumentInputBin`标记，但没有`PageInputBin`标记，则此属性具有相同的值`PageInputBin`。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to any <xref:System.Printing.InputBin> value, then matching `JobInputBin` markup will be added to the XML print ticket and any `DocumentInputBin` and `PageInputBin` markup that is already there will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为任何<xref:System.Printing.InputBin>值，然后匹配`JobInputBin`标记将添加到 XML 的打印票证和任何`DocumentInputBin`和`PageInputBin`将删除已存在的标记。</xref:System.Printing.InputBin>

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.InputBinCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.InputBinCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.InputBinCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Printing.InputBin"></xref> value indicating what input tray is used and whether it is chosen manually or automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.InputBin"> </xref>值，该值指示使用哪些输入的栏和是否选择了手动或自动。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.InputBin"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.InputBin"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the printer handles content that has color or shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值打印机如何处理具有颜色或灰色阴影的内容。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputColor` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputColor`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputColorCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputColorCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputColorCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Printing.OutputColor"></xref> value indicating how the printer handles content that has color or shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.OutputColor"> </xref>值，该值指示打印机如何处理具有颜色或灰色阴影的内容。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.OutputColor"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.OutputColor"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the quality of output for the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值为打印作业的输出的质量。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputQuality` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputQuality`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputQualityCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputQualityCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputQualityCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Printing.OutputQuality"></xref> value that specifies the needed level of quality.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.OutputQuality"> </xref>值，该值指定所需的级别的质量。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.OutputQuality"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.OutputQuality"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the device prints content to the edge of the media or leaves an unprinted margin around the edge.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示设备是否将内容打印到介质的边缘或离开边缘周围有的边距。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageBorderless"></xref> value that specifies whether the printer uses borderless printing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageBorderless"> </xref>值，该值指定打印机是否使用边框打印。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.PageBorderless"></xref> enumeration.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page size for the paper (or other media) that a printer uses for a print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于纸 （或其他媒体） 的打印机是使用为打印作业的页大小。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaSize` keyword.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageMediaSize"></xref> object that represents the page size by using a name, dimensions, or both.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageMediaSize"> </xref>使用名称和 / 或维度，表示页大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating what sort of paper or media the printer uses for the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值什么样的纸张或打印机时使用的打印作业的介质。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageMediaType"></xref> value specifying the print media, such as card stock, label, plain, or photographic.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是否打印机上打印后到前或前端到后端的多个页。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobPageOrder`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrderCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrderCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrderCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrder"></xref> value specifying last-page-first printing or first-page-first printing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrder"> </xref>值，该值指定上一次页先打印或第一页先打印。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrder"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.PageOrder"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the page content is oriented for printing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值面向打印页面内容的方式。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOrientation` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOrientation`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrientationCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrientationCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageOrientationCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"></xref> value specifying how page content is oriented, for example, <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"> </xref>值，该值指定如何页面内容的方向，例如， <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.PageOrientation"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of page resolution that the printer uses for a print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印机时使用的打印作业的页面分辨率的级别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution> class has properties in which you can specify the dots-per-inch for the X and Y dimensions and a property where you can give a qualitative expression to the resolution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution>类具有可以在其中指定 X 和 Y 维度的每英寸点数的属性和属性可以为提供分辨率定性表达式。</xref:System.Printing.PageResolution>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageResolution` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageResolution`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageResolutionCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageResolutionCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageResolutionCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageResolution"></xref> value that represents the resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PageResolution"> </xref>作为定性值和 / 或每英寸点数值，该值代表分辨率的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置依据打印机放大或缩小页上打印的图像的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The printer can have maximum and minimum limits for scaling.
trans-unit.target: 打印机可以缩放的最大和最小限制。

trans-unit.source: You can test for scale limits by using <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageScalingFactorRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageScalingFactorRange%2A>。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PageScalingFactorRange%2A>测试规模限制

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This PageScalingFactor property generally represents the **Scale** `ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此 PageScalingFactor 属性通常表示**缩放**`ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`关键字。

trans-unit.source: But there are some complexities as follows.
trans-unit.target: 但有一些复杂性，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: When reading the PageScalingFactor property, the property behaves as follows.
trans-unit.target: 在读取 PageScalingFactor 属性时，该属性的行为，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: - If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **CustomSquare** option, and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果 PrintTicket XML 文档具有`PageScaling`功能设置为**CustomSquare**选项，与**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放**值是正值，则返回的值。

trans-unit.source: - If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **Custom** option, and the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果 PrintTicket XML 文档具有`PageScaling`功能设置为**自定义**选项，与**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值是正值，则返回的值。

trans-unit.source: - In all other cases, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: -在所有其他情况下，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: When setting the PageScalingFactor property, the property behaves as follows.
trans-unit.target: 设置 PageScalingFactor 属性时，该属性的行为，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: - If it’s set to `null`, then the `PageScaling` markup is removed from the PrintTicket XML document.
trans-unit.target: -如果设置为`null`，则`PageScaling`从 PrintTicket XML 文档中删除标记。

trans-unit.source: - Otherwise, the `PageScaling` feature in the PrintTicket XML document is set to **CustomSquare** and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is set to the passed value.
trans-unit.target: -否则为`PageScaling`PrintTicket XML 文档中的功能设置为**CustomSquare**和**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放**值设置为传递的值。

trans-unit.source: (See **Exceptions** for what happens if the property is set to a value less than 1.)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅**异常**如果属性设置为小于 1 的值将发生什么情况。)

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents a percentage.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示百分比的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在每个打印一端一张纸打印的页面数。

trans-unit.source: Most printers support only a limited range of specific possibilities, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, and 16 pages per side.
trans-unit.target: 大多数打印机仅支持有限的范围的特定的可能性，如 1、 2、 4、 6、 8 和一面。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **PagesPerSheet**`ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**PagesPerSheet** `ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nullable <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 null<xref:System.Int32>打印表示每个打印的页面数的值的一端一张纸。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值打印机如何排列在每个边一张纸打印的多个页面。

trans-unit.source: For example, a printer can present pages in left-to-right rows with rows stacked top-to-bottom.
trans-unit.target: 例如，打印机可以呈现页中从左到右行与行堆积上到。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **PresentationDirection** subfeature of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**PresentationDirection** subfeature 的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection"></xref> value indicating how a printer presents multiple pages per sheet.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection"> </xref>值，该值指示打印机在每个表的多个页上呈现的方式。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在定性术语中的打印机使用打印面部照片的质量级别。

trans-unit.source: The photographic printer driver translates the qualitative expression in this property into specific quantitative values for resolution and other factors.
trans-unit.target: 照片打印机驱动程序定性将表达式转换在此属性为特定分辨率和其他因素的定量值。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PhotoPrintingIntentCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PhotoPrintingIntentCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.PhotoPrintingIntentCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PhotoPrintingIntent"></xref> value indicating the level of photo quality.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PhotoPrintingIntent"> </xref>值，该值指示的照片质量级别。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.PhotoPrintingIntent"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.PhotoPrintingIntent"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 时发生任何属性<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>更改。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Saves the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 将保存<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>设置应用于<xref:System.IO.Stream>使用符合 XML 格式的对象[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This method does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。

trans-unit.source: You should reset it immediately after calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 你应之后重置立即调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If any properties of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何属性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>是`null`，它们将只需不包含在 XML 标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document saved by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>对象使用包含标记元素不表示任何 PrintTicket 文档构造<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法由保存 PrintTicket 文档。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> that holds the saved <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>保存保存<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是否，以及在何处，打印机装订多个页。

trans-unit.source: For example, a printer can place two staples on the left edge of a sheet of paper, or one staple in the upper left corner.
trans-unit.target: 例如，打印机可以将两个日常用品放置一张纸或在左上角的一个装订的左边缘。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentStaple`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.Stapling"></xref> value specifying how a printer staples the output.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.Stapling"> </xref>值，该值指定如何打印机装订输出。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.Stapling"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.Stapling"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the printer handles text that uses TrueType fonts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值打印机如何处理使用 TrueType 字体的文本。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified.
trans-unit.target: A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> (see <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) will not contain any markup for this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>(请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A>) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.GetXmlStream%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.SaveTo%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`关键字。

trans-unit.source: You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.TrueTypeFontModeCapability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.TrueTypeFontModeCapability%2A>属性。</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.TrueTypeFontModeCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode"></xref> value specifying how a printer handles TrueType fonts.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode"> </xref>值，该值指定如何打印机处理 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 调用代码已尝试将属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode"></xref>枚举。
